Text: Can anyone confirm if this works, downloaded 3 different portal 2 rips now, seriously don't want things to go wrong again... also spyshadow, do you have any tips for how to unpack/unzip and play? thanks :)

I can confirmed that it works sense I played it first before uploading. Played through the whole game that is. I included a better crack that won't crash the game. Only tips is to extract the ISO and Readme. Install game then copy crack files into program directory and then launch the game. If it still does not run, check your system requirements. I played this game on a Nvida GeForce 8500 GT which worked ok on low resolution. If I remember, I was playing it on Windows XP with direct x 9.0c
